magpie.attributes.evaluators

Class PolynomialFitEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.attributes.evaluators.BaseAttributeEvaluator
      • magpie.attributes.evaluators.PolynomialFitEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Options

    public class PolynomialFitEvaluator
extends BaseAttributeEvaluator
    Evaluate an attribute based on the RMSE of polynomial model using that attribute. This is exactly the method used by Meredig and Wolverton (2014) in their Clustering-Ranking-Modeling method.

    Usage: <order>
    order: Order of polynomial fit to data when evaluating attributes
